description:
Survive the post-war Norway and outlive the apocalypse in Vigor, a free-to-play multiplayer looter shooter.

Explore the Nordic scenery in Encounters. Choose your playstyle - sneaky looter or deadly shooter.

Build the Shelter from resources acquired in Encounters and upgrade it to unlock extra features.

Play Shootout, a fast-paced solo combat, or Elimination, a 5v5 tactical, round based team fight.
name: Vigor
